verbs.description: Stephen Curry and LeBron James [V: might] be warring on the court during the NBA finals , but they are standing in solidarity on one important issue . Both apparently agree that no matter which team wins , neither one intends to pay President Trump a White House visit . Ai n’t nobody got time for Trump ’s petty antics . —April Ryan …
